title: Dawit Mebratu
text:
Dawit Abraha Mebratu (, born 13 June 1984 in <a href="Ethiopia">Ethiopia</a>) is an Ethiopian <a href="Association%20football">football</a> midfielder. He currently plays for <a href="Saint-George%20SA">Saint-George SA</a>.
International career.
Mebratu was a member of the <a href="Ethiopia%20national%20football%20team">Ethiopia national football team</a>, and was part of the Ethiopia squad at the <a href="2001%20FIFA%20World%20Youth%20Championship">2001 FIFA World Youth Cup</a>.
